thread.title: Kerry
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Kerry

author: Kerry
title: Kerry
text: I purchased three Vivienne Westwood bags and was extremely pleased with the communication, packaging and speedy delivery of all three items which I placed in two orders. Would highly recommend. Thank you.
